title: Deals: Apple Watch Series 10 for $329, $100 Off iPad Air, M2 MacBook Air for $799, $70 AirTags 4-pack
description: Amazon continues to offers fantastic deals on various Apple products, and right now you can get 18% off the Apple Watch Series 10, $100 off M2 iPad Air models, the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 (down $200 from $999), or a 4-pack of AirTag trackers for just $70. What’s not to like about that? ... Read More
author: OSXDaily
excerpt: Amazon continues to offers fantastic deals on various Apple products, and right now you can get 18% off the Apple Watch Series 10, $100 off M2 iPad Air models, the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 (dow…
text: Amazon continues to offers fantastic deals on various Apple products, and right now you can get 18% off the Apple Watch Series 10, $100 off M2 iPad Air models, the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 (down $200 from $999), or a 4-pack of AirTag trackers for just $70. What’s not to like about that? Check out the deals below. Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399) Apple Watch Series 10 is the newest model available, but while Apple retail is $399, you can get 18% off from Amazon and get the same watch for just $329. Available in different color and band options, Apple Watch Series 10 includes a larger 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri, and more. Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP) M2 iPad Air 13″ or 11″ – $499 & $799 ($100 off) Amazon is taking $100 off the retail price of the iPad Air 13″ and 11″ models, making them a fantastic tablet at a reasonable price point. The latest iPad Air features an M2 chip, flicker-free LCD display in 11″ or 13″ sizes, Apple Intelligence support, 12MP front camera with center stage, 12MP rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, 128GB starting storage, and there are multiple color options available. 13″ M2 iPad Air – $799 (down from $899) 11″ M2 iPad Air – $499 (down from $599) M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $799 Amazon has the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 for the 16GB RAM / 256GB storage model, a 20% discount from MSRP of $999. The M2 chip is the prior generation chip for MacBook Air, but it supports Apple Intelligence, and is still fast and energy efficient. This is a great Mac for a great discounted price, and if you want something more capable and fully featured than a 13″ iPad Air, this might be just what you’re looking for. M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – $799 (down from $999) AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99) Apple sells the 4-pack of AirTags for $99, but why pay more than you have to? Amazon is taking $30 off, bringing the 4-pack of personal trackers down to just $70. These are fantastic for keeping track of your belongings, luggage, purse, backpack, dog, cat, car, bike, scooter, car keys, packages, or anything else you might want to keep track of. AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99) FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
html:
Amazon continues to offers fantastic deals on various Apple products, and right now you can get 18% off the Apple Watch Series 10, $100 off M2 iPad Air models, the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 (down $200 from $999), or a 4-pack of AirTag trackers for just $70. What’s not to like about that? Check out the deals below.

Apple Watch Series 10 – $329 (down from $399)

Apple Watch Series 10 is the newest model available, but while Apple retail is $399, you can get 18% off from Amazon and get the same watch for just $329. Available in different color and band options, Apple Watch Series 10 includes a larger 42mm always-on display, all-day battery life, fitness and activity tracking features, heart rate monitor, ECG, crash detection, fall detection, Emergency SOS, ovulation tracking, GPS, pinch gesture support, water resistance, voice control, Siri, and more.

  • Get Apple Watch Series 9 for $329 (check out color options, down from $399 MSRP)

M2 iPad Air 13″ or 11″ – $499 & $799 ($100 off)

Amazon is taking $100 off the retail price of the iPad Air 13″ and 11″ models, making them a fantastic tablet at a reasonable price point. The latest iPad Air features an M2 chip, flicker-free LCD display in 11″ or 13″ sizes, Apple Intelligence support, 12MP front camera with center stage, 12MP rear camera, Touch ID on the power button, 128GB starting storage, and there are multiple color options available.

  • 13″ M2 iPad Air – $799 (down from $899)
  • 11″ M2 iPad Air – $499 (down from $599)

M2 MacBook Air 13″ for $799

Amazon has the M2 MacBook Air for just $799 for the 16GB RAM / 256GB storage model, a 20% discount from MSRP of $999. The M2 chip is the prior generation chip for MacBook Air, but it supports Apple Intelligence, and is still fast and energy efficient. This is a great Mac for a great discounted price, and if you want something more capable and fully featured than a 13″ iPad Air, this might be just what you’re looking for.

  • M2 MacBook Air 16/256 – $799 (down from $999)

AirTags 4-pack for $70 (down from $99)

Apple sells the 4-pack of AirTags for $99, but why pay more than you have to? Amazon is taking $30 off, bringing the 4-pack of personal trackers down to just $70. These are fantastic for keeping track of your belongings, luggage, purse, backpack, dog, cat, car, bike, scooter, car keys, packages, or anything else you might want to keep track of.

  • AirTags – 4-pack – $69.99 (down from $99)

FTC: OSXDaily is an affiliate partner with Amazon, meaning if you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment which goes towards keeping the site running.
